subject: Math
goals: Understand the basics of algebraic expressions, including terms, coefficients, and variables. Begin simplifying algebraic expressions using basic operations.
milestones: 1. Familiarity with terms and components of algebraic expressions. 2. Ability to simplify basic algebraic expressions.

learning_tasks.task: Read about algebraic expressions and identify terms, coefficients, and variables.
Watch an introductory video on simplifying algebraic expressions.

practice_tasks.task: Simplify 10 basic algebraic expressions using addition and subtraction.
Complete a short quiz on identifying terms, coefficients, and variables.

resources: Recommended textbook: 'Algebra for Grade 10' pp. 15-25; Khan Academy videos on Algebra Basics; Online quizzes at MathIsFun.com
